REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1380 reute r f BC-TELE-ART-<TLARF>-EXTE 03-19 0038

TEXT.TITLE: TELE-ART <TLARF> EXTENDS WARRANTS
TEXT.BODY: Tele-Art Inc said its class A warrants which were due to expire March 19 have been extended to April 18. Tele-Art designs and manufactures digital watches and clocks. Reuter
